mcq.statement: Who established the Muslim Students Federation (women wing) in Delhi in 1941?
mcq.one_liner: The Muslim Students Federation (women wing) was established in Delhi in 1941 by **Begum Shaista Ikram-ullah** on the advice of Quaid-i-Azam.
